Text: Be careful with this one, I kept getting a win32/huer warning from my AVG.

I just ran a scan with AVG and MSE and I am showing no such result. It's possible that you yourself may already be infected with win32/huer virus and/or you have a fake antivirus created from the win32/huer virus

http://www.ehow.com/how_6020188_remove-win32-heur-virus.html
